summary: Experienced Software QA Specialist with a proven ability to enhance software quality through comprehensive testing strategies. Skilled in automation, Agile practices, and driving continuous improvement in fast-paced environments.
skills: Python, JavaScript, C#, SQL, Selenium, Appium, Playwright, Postman, Cypress, TestRail, Jira

expertise.automation_scripting: Skilled in using Selenium, Appium, and Cypress for test automation; proficient in Python, C#, and JavaScript.
expertise.testing_analysis: Extensive experience in API testing with Postman; adept at load, stress, and performance testing to ensure system reliability.
expertise.agile_management: Expertise in Agile and Scrum methodologies; experienced with Jira and TestRail for project tracking and test management.
expertise.team_collaboration: Effective communicator with experience using Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Zoom for team coordination and remote work.

experience.cdk_global: Led C# test frameworks using Selenium and SpecFlow, conducted Scrum meetings, managed QA team activities, and trained teams in automation at CDK Global.
experience.mark43: Built QA teams, established robust testing frameworks, implemented QA metrics, managed multiple QA teams, and led migrations and CRM projects at Mark43.
experience.amada_america: Developed C#/Selenium test automation frameworks, conducted mobile testing, managed defect tracking, and led QA teams at Amada America.
experience.agosto: Developed mobile automation frameworks using Appium and Python for iOS and Android platforms, managed test runs using TestRail, and collaborated closely with cross-functional teams.
experience.bleachr: Built automation frameworks using Selenium with C#, created detailed test documentation, and coordinated testing efforts with external teams at Bleachr.
experience.yaengage: Led comprehensive testing of web and mobile applications, developed test plans, and implemented automated scripts using Visual Studio at YAEngage.
experience.kiko_labs: Conducted extensive testing of mobile educational games on Android and iOS, designed test cases for regression testing, and collaborated with development teams.
experience.iq_labs: Tested photo-sharing applications, recommended enhancements, and focused on optimizing user experience across web and mobile platforms.

education: Graduated from the University of Minnesota with a focus on Computer Science and Software Quality Assurance.
achievements: Reduced manual testing efforts through innovative QA automation strategies.
Managed and trained diverse teams, fostering effective collaboration in both remote and in-person settings.
Enhanced testing processes and methodologies, improving project efficiency and software quality.
hobbies: Exploring new technologies, automation tools, and caring for my 14 guinea pigs. Follow my pets' adventures on Instagram @holisticguinea.
